snippet: The PGA Tour and the P.G.A. of America announced that they would apply the anchored-stroke ban announced last month by the United States Golf Association and the Royal and Ancient.
abstract: PGA Tour and PGA of America announces that they are backing the anchored-stroke ban announced last month by the United States Golf Association and the Royal and Ancient.
lead_paragraph: The PGA Tour and the P.G.A. of America announced that they would apply the anchored-stroke ban announced last month by the United States Golf Association and the Royal and Ancient.
